item.title: Правительство Южной Кореи намерено принять госстандарт на электронные книги
item.description: Song, Yang-hee, manager at KATS explained that the e book market this year will record huge growth, and if standard is set, it will help local e book market to be boosted. KATS plans to suggest guidelines to minimize confusions in the industry although it takes e Pub, international standard as local standard. ePub is international standard for e book and used by Sony and i River. It can support the other document standards such as txt, pdf and doc.
